changeSet.sql: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW FFF_STAGING.V_ACTIVE_STAGING_EXCEPTION AS SELECT se.* FROM FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION se WHERE se.ACTIVE = 1

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'FFF_STAGING' AND TABLE_NAME = 'V_ACTIVE_STAGING_EXCEPTION') DROP VIEW FFF_STAGING.V_ACTIVE_STAGING_EXCEPTION
